results.title: Causes of death in patients with acute myocardial infarction treated with angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors: findings from the Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto (GISSI)-3 trial.
results.text_hl: The risk of dying from @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Rupture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006341 @@@cardiac rupture@@@ was reduced by 39% by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Pedrazzini G, Santoro E, Latini R, Fromm L, Franzosi MG, Mocetti T, Staszewsky L, Barlera S, Tognoni G, Maggioni AP, GISSI-3 Investigators. Causes of death in patients with acute myocardial infarction treated with angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors: findings from the Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto (GISSI)-3 trial. Am Heart J. 2008 Feb;155(2):388-94. PMID: 18215613
